title: Federated Learning-Based Collaborative Authentication Protocol for Shared Data in Social IoV
summaries: to prevent data leakage and reduce the propagation delay of data, an FL authentication protocol was designed in the social vehicle networking
the anonymous mutual authentication and key agreement are included in the protocol
the proposed protocol are proved to be resistant to replay attacks, sybil attacks, and so on
systemModel: __Trusted Agency (TA)__: a trusted 3rd-party vehicle registration and authentication agency
issue instructions such as automatic vehicle driving decisions and road traffic environment data
provide  wather, news and entertainment advice
obtain CS aggregation model paramters from the TA
a communication module in a vehicle user with a certain degree of computing power
The RSU and CS of the community in which the vehicle is located register the vehicle information in advance with the TA<ol>
bibtex: @article{zhao2022federated, title={Federated learning-based collaborative authentication protocol for shared data in social IoV}, author={Zhao, Pengcheng and Huang, Yuanhao and Gao, Jianping and Xing, Ling and Wu, Honghai and Ma, Huahong}, journal={IEEE Sensors Journal}, volume={22}, number={7}, pages={7385--7398}, year={2022}, publisher={IEEE}}
